text: Mazerolles-le-Salin () is a commune in the Doubs department. It is in the Bourgogne-Franche-Comté region in eastern France. ==Geography== Mazerolles lies west of Besançon. ==Population== ==Related pages== * Communes of the Doubs department ==References== ==Other websites== * Mazerolles-le-Salin on the intercommunal Web site of the department Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Mazerolles-le-Salin
